attributes.additional_details: Its becoming unbareable to live and to comute to and from work, making it almost impossible for someone to save up money other than the Goverment them selfes.
attributes.background: Lower the taxing percentage that they, the Goverment are taking off fuel.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Suspend VAT on road fuels to reduce fuel costs: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/610567

Remove duty on motor fuel completely: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/613908

Halve fuel duty and remove VAT on fuel prices: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/618421
